name: It's a buggy game
description:
This game was made in 72 hours from the 5-7th of February 2021 for the mini game jam 73 by JazzedIceberg (programming) and Toni CG (art, sound).

By having bugs over the power area (clearly marked) you earn power units, and these are indicated at the top. If the timer (60 seconds) runs out or you get over 100 bugs, the game is over. Bugs breed (very buggily) with each other when they get close.

The controls are simple: drag bugs across the screen with the mouse.

This was both of our first jams.
